name: When TV’s Achieved World Domination
description:
Black and white FPS set in the 1970s with the goal of destroying the highly intelligent race of TV screens. Theme - Destroy the TV's so the human race can start a new beginning.

Made with Raycasting Game Maker for the Black and White Jam #0.(9).

Story

TV screens and monitors have taken over the world, they have achieved total world domination.

You need to time travel back to the 1970s when they weren't as advanced and defeat them before they become too strong. You infiltrate their main base, which is utilising the highest technology (of the 70s) to fortify and secure their secret facility.

Your mission is to destroy their base of operations and extinguish this mutation of highly intelligent Televisions.

Controls

Move - WASD
Look - Arrow Keys
Shoot - Left Shift
Switch Weapons - Tab
Open Door - Space
Show Map - F1
